About

I'm a Full Stack Developer, entrepreneur, nerd. I graduated CS from Middle East Technical University. I like learning almost everything probably because I'm a nerd.

Rick and Morty is the awesomest thing I've ever watched. I also love watching animes. They are really weird and fasinating.

I love playing comptetive computer games and board games. I was a semi-pro League of Legends players. Some of my achievements are:

  • League of Legends EU West Server - Diamond League (Top %0.1)
  • League of Legends Turkey Server - Challenger League (Top 50)
  • League of Legends – Riot Turkey - 2013 Winter 5v5 team tournement 4th place
  • League of Legends – Riot Turkey - 2013 Spring 5v5 team tournement 4th place
  • Hearthstone - EU Server - Legend (Top 200)
  • Tetrisbattle - Grandmaster League (Top %0.1)
  • Age of Empires II - Top 1000
